entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
